entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
